title:
Designing Laplacian flows for opinion clustering in structurally
  balanced and unbalanced networks
authors: Vishnudatta Thota, Twinkle Tripathy and Debasattam Pal
abstract:
In this work, we consider a group of n agents whose interactions can be
represented using unsigned or signed structurally balanced graphs or a special
case of structurally unbalanced graphs. A Laplacian-based model is proposed to
govern the evolution of opinions. The objective of the paper is to analyze the
proposed opinion model on the opinion evolution of the agents. Further, we also
determine the conditions required to apply the proposed Laplacian-based opinion
model. Finally, some numerical results are shown to validate these results.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Systems and Control
